column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Nikki - Thanks for the great review! Since we opened our first JINYA nearly two years ago
column2: we have heard customers mention Naruto and his penchant for ramen
column3: so we're glad this exposure to Japanese culture and cuisine brought you to our doorstep. I'm also glad to hear that Hamzeh was able to assist you with your selections
column4: and that your little one enjoyed the Kid's Meal option. Thank you again for your patronage
column5: and we look forward to serving you again in the near future!
